mapper.select: SELECT lecture_no lectureNo, lecture_archive_no lectureArchiveNo, lecture_archive_writer lectureArchiveWriter, lecture_archive_title lectureArchiveTitle, lecture_archive_createdate lectureArchiveCreateDate, lecture_archive_count lectureArchiveCount FROM lecture_archive WHERE lecture_no = #{lectureNo} ORDER BY lecture_archive_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) lectureAchiveCount FROM lecture_archive WHERE lecture_no = #{lectureNo};

SELECT la.lecture_archive_no, la.lecture_no, la.account_id, la.lecture_archive_writer, la.lecture_archive_title, la.lecture_archive_content, la.lecture_archive_createdate, la.lecture_archive_updatedate, la.lecture_archive_count, laf.lecture_archive_file_uuid, laf.lecture_archive_file_original, laf.lecture_archive_file_size, laf.lecture_archive_file_type, laf.lecture_archive_file_count FROM lecture_archive la LEFT OUTER JOIN lecture_archive_file laf ON la.lecture_archive_no = laf.lecture_archive_no WHERE la.lecture_archive_no = #{lectureArchiveNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO lecture_archive ( lecture_no, account_id, lecture_archive_writer, lecture_archive_title, lecture_archive_content, lecture_archive_createdate, lecture_archive_updatedate, lecture_archive_count ) VALUES ( #{lectureNo}, #{accountId}, #{lectureArchiveWriter}, #{lectureArchiveTitle}, #{lectureArchiveContent}, NOW(), NOW(), 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE lecture_archive SET lecture_archive_title = #{lectureArchiveTitle}, lecture_archive_content = #{lectureArchiveContent}, lecture_archive_updatedate = NOW() WHERE lecture_archive_no = #{lectureArchiveNo}
UPDATE lecture_archive SET lecture_archive_count = lecture_archive_count + 1 WHERE lecture_archive_no = #{lectureArchiveNo}
